ftbquests.chapter.black_market.title: 黑市
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest1.desc: &3海底神殿&r隐藏着如何在海底生活的秘密，但这一秘密被&3三位远古海怪&r与其喽啰们严格把守。对于没有水下战斗经验的人来说，海怪那攻守兼备的身躯可能会打得他们手足无措。
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest10.des: 这便是昔日伟大的灾厄船长那未泯的幽魂。&3科妮莉亚船长&r曾迷失在&b冰雪迷阵&r，此后再无音讯。她本想让自己的船队成为第一批涉足这片冰雪之地的来客，并在回程后诉说此地的传说。但是啊，她再也没能返航。据说，在她那船上有一只特殊的海螺，能够唤醒她沉睡的幽魂……
Use the &6Shell Horn&r to summon &3Captain Cornelia&r. The horn can be found within &k&6the Ship&r in the &bIce Maze&r. You must be in the &bIce Maze&r for the &6Shell Horn&r to work.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest11.des: &5迷阵之母&r是一只古老的海怪，她可不喜欢被打扰。来自水中的一阵震动传到你脚下时，你便能感知到她在附近。要和她在刺骨的冰水中战斗，你也许需要准备一套特殊的潜水装备。
当你探索冰雪迷阵时，&5迷阵之母&r每过一段时间就有可能生成。在你看到讯息&6“你感受到了冰下的震动”&r后，就可以到水中去找她战斗。
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest12.des: The &dWilden Chimera&r is a beast so powerful that it took the greatest wizards all of their power to trap it in an &5Archmage Tower&r. The tower by itself could not hold this creature, and many wizards had to stay behind to contain it. Overtime, they too became dark and corrupted. Be sure to train and grow in your power, for this tower is a deadly trap to those who go in unprepared.
&d荒野奇美拉&r也可以用&6荒野召唤之板&r来召唤。不过需要先将荒野尖刺、荒野之角、荒野膜翼放入仪式火盆中后，才能完成召唤&d荒野奇美拉&r的仪式。
&7注意：召唤荒野奇美拉时，召唤仪式会摧毁火盆附近的方块。
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest13.des: 灾厄村民本就是村民的死对头，现在有了这位刚上位的头头，情况就更不妙了。翻新过的林地府邸的地下室里，&3宣判者&r就在他的书房中闭目冥想。要是玩家发起攻击或者在附近搞破坏，他就会立刻醒来并进入战斗，期间其会瞬移并使用魔法武器来对付你。倘若你发现打不过他，可以逃出房间，他会重新坐下冥想。但他只要一日不死，整片黑森林就一日不得安宁。
&2林地府邸&r坐落于&2黑森林&r生物群系中。&3宣判者&r只会待在府邸的地下室里。
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest14.des: 脱胎于无头骑士传说的&6南瓜领主&r誓要让任何胆敢召唤他的人不复存在。不要指望有办法溜之大吉，他的追杀永无止境。即便你能让他离鞍下马，也要面对两个更加致命的形态。下马形态身躯崩毁后，南瓜头仍能独立行动，但若头部被先行摧毁，身躯也会随之灭亡。
手持&a转化试剂&r对着&6恶魔南瓜&r右击以召唤南瓜领主，
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest15.des: &4窃命者&r曾经也是个普通人，可惜他命途不幸，中了黑魔法的邪。如今他受到诅咒，变成了这样一个以命为食的生物，还有一副恐怖的、已无人样的嗜血外表。起初你遇到他时，他看着是个黑袍蔽身的高大身影，但在他将要动手或是承受些伤害后，&4窃命者&r就会伴随一声尖啸显出真身。不过还好，他只会在100天后的夜晚出现。
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest16.des: A stronger version of the once great &4Dead King&r, he can be summoned to fight once more. This time he will be more difficult to beat, but the rewards will also grow. The key to summoning him is hidden within his &cCatacombs&r.
The &4Enraged Dead King&r is summoned using a &6&kspell&r found within his &cCatacombs&r.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest17.des: 那早已崩殂的帝王……那迷宫般葬着他尸骸与财宝的陵墓……&4死者之王&r沉睡于&c亡灵古墓&r的大殿王座上，与其交互即可唤醒。与掌控强大法力的他战斗绝对是一场艰难的的挑战，但若能成功击败他，他那取之不尽的金银财宝都将归你所有。但还需当心……这也许并不是你最后见到这位阴魂不散的&4死者之王&r。
&6归途指南针&r会为你指明&c死者之王的亡灵古墓&r的方向。
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest18.des: 这些全副武装的骑士们多年以前就迷失在了地底，既不是人，也不是什么雕像。他们早已忘却自己是要守护何物；他们早已忘却自己是从何时开始等待；他们早已忘却自己是要为何人祭奠。只剩下残存于不锈的钢铁躯壳中的本能——斩杀一切靠近此处的活物。&c钢铁守护者&r全身被刀枪不入的精锻盔甲所包围，只有一处弱点等待你去发现。
Use an &6Eye of Wrought&r to locate the &cFerrous Wroughtnaut&r. You may also find them by locating the entrance to &5The End&r.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest19.des: &eUmvuthi&r is the creator of the &eAbavuthana&r, residing in a stationary seat upon a throne in savanna groves. He draws his power from the sun, calling forth sunstrikes, solar flares, and massive solar beams. He can also create Umvuthana followers - including healers called &eUmvuthana Cranes&r - from masks to defend him during combat. As such, his masked children revere him as a god. Unequipped travelers should keep their distance from his grove, lest they be smitten by his heliomancy.
Use the &6Eye of Sunbird&r to locate &eUmvuthani&r and his followers in the savanna.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest2.desc: 曾经只存在于流言与传说中的怪物如今降临人间。亡灵怪物&b凋灵&r狰狞可怖，其所到之处唯余凋零与枯败。但若能使之授首，你便能点亮一道直冲云霄的璀璨光柱。
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest20.des: &b霜冻巨兽&r是偶尔出没于雪地的危险野兽。它们那硕大而灵活的身躯，以及强力的冰之吐息，都让它们近乎不可战胜。你若是在旅行中遇见了这只巨兽在沉睡，最好还是绕道而行，让它睡就好。这些野兽们都守护着一种能够释放极冬能量的珍稀冰晶。
Use the &6Eye of Frost&r to locate the &bFrostmaw &rin its snowy den.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest21.des: &c下界合金巨兽&r诞生于很多年前一次怪异的事故中。那时，某位铁匠正在测试一个融合了熔岩、下界合金和液态超经验的新装置，结果遭到了恶魂的攻击，他本人则被炸进了这摊混合物中。等他再次醒来时，那副躯壳早已不是人类，却似一头&c恶兽&r。他暴怒成恨，恨着世间乃至其中万物。时至今日，他仍住在自己那座&c灵魂锻造厂&r中，不断测试自己迸发着炽热的力量，并用之摧毁任何靠近此间的外来者。
当你靠近灵魂锻造厂中沉睡的巨兽时，他便会醒来。在&4下界&r使用&6恶兽之眼&可以找到这座锻造厂。
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest22.des: 作为&5黑曜石柱&r的远亲，&d末影守卫&r就住在&5末地&r维度。其身形与末地城浑然一体，故而常被认为是&d废弃堡垒&r的实体化身。这种造物极度孤僻，任何闯入它领地的人都难逃与它一战。为了防范侵入者，&d末影守卫&r特地在&d废弃堡垒&r中布下了重重陷阱。小心你的每一步！
靠近那位于废弃堡垒最底层的虚空祭坛，末影守卫便会苏醒。在&5末地&r维度中使用&6虚空之眼&r可以定位废弃堡垒的位置。
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest23.des: &9利维坦&r曾是海域的至高神明，如今却被封印在深渊祭坛中。这只巨型海怪般的造物就沉睡在&9沉没之城&r当中，被深不可测的海洋之力守护着。城中住着不少珊瑚和人鱼怪物，都正准备全力阻挠任何胆敢窥窃神明的的入侵者。要提防的可不止这群守卫，还有那苏醒后便会立刻迎击你的&9利维坦&r本身。但若你能赢下这场战斗，整片海洋便会从此屈服于你的意志。
&7据说吃掉那&r&d受祝福的紫水晶蟹肉&r&7能够帮助你抵御来自利维坦攻击的负面效果。不过这蟹究竟在何处出没？又要怎样才能使其发挥出&r&d抵抗深渊的紫水晶力量？&r
要召唤利维坦，需把深渊祭品置于深渊祭坛上。祭品的合成材料基本都由沉没之城中各种生物掉落。在&2主世界&r维度中使用&6深渊之眼&r可以定位沉没之城的位置。
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest24.des: &4先驱者&r栖息在一座充满难以想象的先进科技的&4远古工厂&r。这座工厂最伟大的造物正是&4先驱者&r本身。由于不满自身以及其他机器们所受的待遇，&4先驱者&r怒而起义，把创造它的主人轰成了碎片。但新生的自由滋长了它的权欲与贪婪。如今&4先驱者&r仍蛰伏在工厂中，为自己有朝一日征服主世界的计划做着准备。
手持下界之星右击&4先驱者&r来唤醒它。在&2主世界&r维度中使用&6机械之眼&r可以定位&4远古工厂&r的位置。
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest25.des: Long ago, before players or villagers or even creepers, dinosaurs called the Overworld their home. But disaster struck, and they were forced to flee deep underground into &aPrimordial Caves&r. Only one species, the &6Thornapod&r, remained on the surface, and that would become its downfall.

Archeologists throughout the realm speak of the &eAncient Remnant&r. It is a skeletal statue resembling a &6Thornapod&r that can be found at the bottom of the &eCursed Pyramid&r, a vast new dungeon within the desert. The &ePyramid&r is full of treasures galore, but that is not all that lies inside. Traps, hostiles, and puzzles await the player to stop them from conquering this dungeon.
当你找到远古遗魂时，它会如雕像般静静矗立着。需要手持&e沙漠项链&r右击来唤醒它。
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest26.des: 哪怕可能不是&6Integrated Minecraft&r中最强大的敌人，&4焰魔&r也称得上数一数二的劲敌。在前往挑战他前，最好确保你已做好充分准备且深刻理解其机制。&4焰魔&r如神一般，甚至可能已然成神。那些曾经妄图弑神的挑战者们无一归还，因此世人对其知之甚少。焰魔之名威震四方，因此 &4烈焰竞技场&r中连一只凋灵骷髅，一只猪灵，一只恶魂都找不到，他们唯恐惹怒了这尊烈焰神明与其亲卫们。你是否有胆入局呢？
要召唤焰魔，需要先杀掉他的几个亲卫，也即那些燃魂。他们会掉落炽燃余烬，这便是用于在烈焰祭坛上召唤焰魔的道具。在&4下界&r维度中使用&6火焰之眼&r可以定位烈焰竞技场的位置。
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest27.des: A warrior Angel once upon a time who became corrupted by power and greed. Kicked out of its celestial home and forced to live in a &bFrosted Prison&r in the Overworld, &bMaledictus&r became a tyrannical lord. Eventually all the citizens nearby fled leaving only &bMaledictus&r and his most faithful warriors behind. Now &bMaledictus&r spends his days asleep, dreaming of his return home where he plans to wage war on those who wronged him.
To wake Maledictus, r-click on his grave within the Frosted Prison in the &2Overworld&r. Use an &6Eye of Curse&r to locate the Frosted Prison.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest28.des: Think the &3Adjudicator&r was difficult? His successor is even worse. More powerful than an evoker and adjudicator combined, this Illager leader lives within the &dPillager Fortress&r. Despite his great strengths, defeating just him is not the only hard part. He is protected by legions of marauders, vindicators, ravagers, and more. To get to the &eInvoker&r, one must be prepared.
The &eInvoker&r spawns at the top of the &dPillager Fortress&r.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest29.des: Ruler of the Dreadlands, the &bDread Queen&r uses her army to reign supreme over that icy and bitter dimension. But the Dreadlands has nothing left to conquer, and so she has turned her sights elsewhere. Now there are &bDread Citadels&r appearing in snowy lands across the Overworld. These looming structures house the &bDread Queen’s&r army, and in the throne room, the &bDread Queen&r herself.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest3.desc: Without eyes to see with, the &3Warden&r uses preternatural hearing to locate trespassers in its &3Ancient City&r. This being usually remains submerged in the skulk, but it will appear should the alarm sound three times. Are you brave enough to explore the &3Ancient City&r and seek out its treasures?
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest30.des: It is unknown how the &aVoid Blossom&r came to be. Perhaps a science experiment gone wrong, toxic gas mixing with spore blossoms, or a dark warlock casting a spell. A sentient plant creature living deep within a dungeon. Although not as frightening as other hostiles found inside, it won’t be long before its vines and poisons bring death your way.
The &aVoid Blossom&r spawns within the &4&kAncient Mines&r.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest31.des: In times of old, Giants ruled the &4Nether&r. But now they are gone and only pieces remain. One such piece is the sentient gauntlet of the Giant King. Left behind in the remains of the King’s treasure room, the netherite glove became embedded into the stone in the center of the room. To awaken the gauntlet, mine a piece of the stone. Though the &4Nether Gauntlet&r may look a bit silly, don’t let it “hand” you a defeat. It will use powerful explosions and fire to take you down.
The &4Nether Gauntlet&r is found in the &4Gauntlet Arena&r. Break one of the blocks with eyes on it to spawn the &4Gauntlet&r.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest32.des: A void being of unknown origin, the &5Obsidilith&r calls the End its home. It lives at the top of a large, cubic structure that floats in the void. Some think that this is to make it easier for the &5Obsidilith&r to defend its home. After all, not many creatures can survive in nothingness.
The &5Obsidilith&r can be spawned by placing an Eye of Ender into the Obsidian Altar at the top of the &5Obsidilith Arena&r.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest33.des: For those who seek to explore and loot the &dPink Salt Shrine&r deep underground, be warned for it is protected against trespassers. The &dBerserker&r is the guardian of this shrine. What once was a normal zombie became fused with the pink salt within the shrine and turned into the behemoth it now is. It's rage and chaos unparalleled by any others within the cave.
The &dBerserker&r is in the &dPink Salt Shrine&r. This shrine spawns in pink salt caves, typically under mountainous biomes.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest34.des: &eWildfire&r, the master of blazes, is protected by four blazing shields. The guardians of the &4Nether Citadel&r, &eWildfires&r bring a heated fight. This encounter is not a friendly one, watch out for its shield debris barrage and ground-shaking shockwave attack. When cornered, it summons blazes for reinforcement.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest35.des: A monster with one body and six…no three…no nine heads. The &aHydra&r makes its lair in &2swampy&r biomes. The fog helping it to sneak up on and poison its prey. This creature will attack anything that moves, so you better hope it’s not got its sights set on you. If it does, make sure to keep it alight with fire, so that its heads do not multiply.
The &aHydra&r will spawn in its lair throughout &2swamp-like&r biomes.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest36.des: The &aGorgon&r was once a beautiful woman but is now cursed into a monster and trapped within a deadly maze. But despite her appearance being a curse, she has slain many adventurers with her stony gaze. Avert your eyes, lest you fall to the same fate.
The Gorgon is located within the &6&kLabyrinth&r.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest37.des: Fire Dragons can be found in hot biomes such as deserts and mesas.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest38.des: Ice Dragons can be found in cold biomes such as snowy plains and ice spikes.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest39.des: Lightning Dragons can be found anywhere in the Overworld as long as the altitude (y-level) is high enough.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest4.desc: The ruler over the entire End dimension, the &5Ender Dragon&r acts as a gatekeeper for any adventurers who step foot in her dimension. She is a mighty beast who protects her land, but often overlooks her harm of the other End residents. Once you travel to the End, the &5Ender Dragon&r is the only thing standing between you and returning home to the Overworld.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest40.des: &2Cyclopes&r are a species of one-eyed giants. Filled with a love for sheep and a hatred for humans, they stay in caves watching over their flocks. You may occasionally see one taking a stroll with their flock of sheep out in the plains. Brute force is their strength while vision is their weakness. It is said that an accurate shot towards its eye can leave the &2Cyclops&r blinded and stunned.
&2Cyclopes&r are most often found in their &7stoney coves&r along &ebeaches&r, but occasionally can be spotted roaming &2plains&r and &2savannas&r.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest41.des: Though safe from these creatures on the surface, deep under the water is another story. Giant &9Eels&r lurk in the depths of the &bIce Maze&r. They prey on those who sought to build shelter deep in the ice to escape the bitter wind. These creatures have been cursed to forever haunt these shelters and attack any who enter. The &9Eel&r remains in the water below the shelters, but will leap out to attack anyone and anything nearby.
&9Eels&r spawn underneath &8&kShelters&r in the &bIce Maze&r. You must go down into the bottom of the &8&kShelter&r.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest42.des: Residing within dark caves, the &4Mother of Spiders&r protects her kin. She is the last true descendant of &6Arachne&r and as such holds more power and abilities to the other arachnids you have encountered. The &4Mother&r poisons and slows her victims. She will also summon her children to help fight off attackers. Once defeated, she will leave behind a mess of her webs, and should you be lucky enough, one of her &cMandibles&r.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest43.des: The &cMissionary&r is a powerful spirit sent to bring chaos to the Overworld. They were created for only one purpose: destroy the Overworld. With the power to control the weather and undead mobs, the &cMissionary&r will stop at nothing to achieve its goal.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest5.desc: Created through a sacrificial ritual performed by Underzealots, &4Forsaken&r are large hostile mobs with sound-based attacks. They fight foes with sonic waves in addition to a variety of melee strikes from their upper arms, and can leap around to gain a better position. Although weaker than a Warden’s sonic blast, it can still pack a punch and pierce through armor.
Fun Fact: &4Forsaken&r are immune to the &3Warden’s&r sonic blast but the &3Warden&r can be damaged extra by the &4Forsaken’s&r sonic attack.
Forsaken are found within the &4Forlorn Hollows&r biome only when &6Underzealots&r sacrifice &6Vespers&r.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest6.desc: Although not always hostile, &9hullbreakers&r are foreboding giants that lurk in the depths of the &9Abyssal Chasm&r. They are frightful predators that can reach a size of 14 blocks long. They do not attack on sight, but rather on light. &9Hullbreakers&r have an aversion to anything emitting light and will seek to destroy it at all cost. This could range from a gentle glow squid to the bright floodlights of a submarine. They tend to circle their prey before attacking, so shut your lights off quickly if you notice one of these creatures.
&9Hullbreakers&r are found within the &9Abyssal Chasm&r biome.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest7.desc: Long ago, before players or villagers or even creepers, dinosaurs called the Overworld their home. But disaster struck, and they were forced to flee deep underground into &aPrimordial Caves&r. The greatest and most deadly of the creatures within is the &cLuxtructosaurus&r. This dinosaur causes nearby other volcanoes to erupt, has a powerful stomp attack that can level terrain, and can enter an enraged state that grants it the ability to breathe flames in addition to creating fissures in the ground with its stomp.
The Luxtructosaurus can be spawned by throwing an &6Ominous Catalyst&r onto an active Volcanic Core in the &2Primordial Caves&r biome.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest8.desc: The &5Void Worm&r is the result of a failed experiment to clone the &5Ender Dragon&r. Instead of a dragon, the experiment resulted in a hostile, worm-like creature that shoots through the sky and teleports around to throw its opponents off balance. The most dangerous part of the failed cloning experiment, perhaps, is that the &5Void Worm&r can clone itself. If shot anywhere except its head, the &5Void Worm&r will split in two at the wound.
&5The Void Worm&r can only be summoned if the &5Ender Dragon&r is already defeated. To summon the &5Void Worm&r, throw a &9Mysterious Worm&r into the void while in the End dimension.
ftbquests.chapter.boss_codex.quest9.desc: “You are what you eat.” This saying has perhaps never been more apt than when it comes to a &cCrimson Mosquito&r. The mosquito will transform into a &3Warped Mosco&r by drinking the blood of a Warped Fungus &dMungus&r. Once the transformation is complete, the &3Mosco&r will become enraged and attack any nearby creature it sees as food, using its massive body as a weapon. It is unknown why only the &dMungus&r seems to cause this reaction. Perhaps this should be studied more…

&dMungus&r spawn in &dMushroom Island&r biomes, and &cCrimson Mosquitos&r spawn in &cCrimson Forest&r biomes. A fly can also turn into a Crimson Mosquito if exposed to the Nether for too long. You will need to get these two mobs in the same place. You can r-click a &dMungus&r with &3warped fungus&r to make it a &3Warped Fungus &r&dMungus&r, but only if it does not already have mushrooms of a different type on its body.

ftbquests.chapter.create_the_andesite_ag: 安山合金可以通过将铁锭和安山岩在工作台中按照2x2的棋盘式摆放合成得到。(译者注：其实是铁粒)
制作安山合金
动力犁可以用来清理地面。当它们被安装在移动结构上时，可以用于破坏非实体碰撞方块（例如草、雪层、火把等）。此外，动力犁在移动时还能将土转化为耕地。更重要的是，动力犁可以以钟摆式的运动将实体推开，而不会对它们造成伤害。快和你的朋友试试吧！
自动锄
砍树可能会耗费你的大量时间。如果你和我一样对此感到厌烦，不妨试试动力锯。这种锯可以一次性砍倒整棵树。只需确保将树干底部的所有方块全部锯掉即可。
朝上放置的动力锯可以像切石机一样加工物品。切片机也可以加工物品，但更适合用于食物的生产。当配备如刀或斧这样的工具时，切片机就可以切割物品。这非常适合用来打造自动化厨房！切片机可以处理传送带、置物台上或工作盆中的物品。
自动斧
动力锯与切片机
Basic Kinetic Appliances
动力辊压机是整个&e机械动力&r中最重要的机器之一！它可以将材料辊压成板材。这些板材在各种配方中至关重要，包括一些其他动力装置的制作。如果没有这台机器，要实现全面自动化将非常困难。
&b（双关语完全是故意的）&r（译者注：这里指create同时代表机械动力和创造是个双关）
动力收割机会收获并重新补种在它们移动路径上的成熟作物。
现在您已经了解动力的基本来源和使用方式，是时候学习如何将这些东西结合在一起了。
Combining things together
&e传送带：&r以与输入的旋转相同的速度运输物品。可以水平运输物品，也可以沿45度角向斜上下运输。可以在传送带上方放置辊压机和其他动力装置，在物品移动过程中加工它们。
&e安山漏斗：&r用于向存储中输入或输出物品。这可以包括箱子、传送带、保险库等。使用扳手右键点击可更改漏斗的方向（输入或输出），除非它被安装在移动的传送带上。
&e安山隧道：&r与漏斗一样可以过滤物品，但它用于将每一堆经过的物品分离出一个，并输出到一个单独的垂直方向。
&b下一页继续 ->&r
&e置物台：&r一个用于存放需要加工的物品的固定装置。通常与动力辊压机一起使用。右键点击可以放置或取出物品。
&e弹射置物台：&r从一个方向输入应力，并在另一个方向输出应力。只有在接收到红石信号时时才会切换应力方向。（译者注：这其实是反转齿轮箱的描述，作者写错了）
&e物品保险库：&r可以比比箱子更高效地存储物品，但无法直接访问存储。物品必须通过漏斗、新生魔艺的存储讲台讲台、汤姆的简易存储的存储终端等输入或输出。
&e溜槽：&r垂直运输物品的最佳方式。溜槽会因重力自然向下输送物品，但如果在其下方放置一个朝正确方向吹风的鼓风机，也可以将物品向上输送。溜槽无法水平连接，只能对角放置连接。
处理物品
&e大齿轮：&r可通过齿轮啮合或中心的传动杆连接，用于传递应力。可以与另一大齿轮垂直连接，或与小齿轮对角连接。
&e齿轮：&r可通过齿轮啮合或中心的传动杆连接，用于传递应力。可以与另一齿轮在顶部、底部或一侧连接，或者与大齿轮对角连接。
&e传动杆：&r正如其外观和名称所示，用于在直线上传递应力。
&e链式传动箱：&r沿直线连接，保持相同的旋转方向。末端的链式传动箱可以进行一次90度旋转。
&b下一页继续 ->&r
&e十字齿轮箱：&r可以很简单的实现90度轴向转变。在工作台中可以转换成&e垂直十字齿轮箱&r。
&e反转齿轮箱：&r从一个方向输入应力，并在另一个方向输出应力。只有在受到红石供能时才会切换应力方向。
&e可调节链式传动箱：&r功能与链式传动箱类似。当接收到红石信号时时，会将转速调节至链式传动箱旋转速度是相邻其他链式传动箱转速的一半。
传递动力
石磨用于研磨物品。物品必须从顶部输入。石磨通过齿轮输入应力驱动。
与动力辊压机类似，但用于搅拌而不是辊压。与工作盆配合使用，可以自动合成任何无序工作台配方。此外，还可以将动力搅拌器与加热的工作盆一起使用，进行更多配方。
自动合成（但只有一点）
动力搅拌器（和工作盆）
&b安山岩&r是&e机械动力&r中最重要的材料之一！它可用于制作&b安山合金&r和&b安山机壳&r，而这些材料又用于制作许多关键部件。
&6通过将安山合金手动安装到去皮原木上制作安山机壳。&r
自动化一切的开始！
现在是时候运用你学到的知识，建造一个自动刷石机了。像传统的刷石机一样放置水和岩浆，但在圆石生成的位置面对着放一个动力钻。用水车为其提供应力，并想办法收集掉落的方块（如漏斗、安山和黄铜漏斗、传送带等）。
&l&b瞧！&r你已经完成了一个&l&e机械动力创作！&r
刷石机
练习时间
机械动力模组内置了一个可视化指南来帮助你。如果你仍然不明白某些内容，可以试着思索一下。在物品栏中将光标悬停在大多数机械动力模组的机器上时，按住&e“W”&r即可查看详细说明。
嗯，我想…
Hmm, I wonder...
还是不明白？
水是不可低估的。它侵蚀峡谷，塑造悬崖，也在可怕的洪水中冲走一切。然而，在适度的基础上，它也能为人所用，带来益处。&9水车&r就是水流如何转化为应力的绝佳例子。
&6让一股水流穿过水车的叶片来使其转动。至于水流冲击水车叶片的面数多少则无关紧要，只要冲击一面就足以让水车全力运转。&r
哗啦！
水的力量
Power Generation
没有足够的资源利用风或水？别担心！拿起一个&6手摇曲柄&r，自己完成工作。不过，这会消耗大量体力，所以一定不要让自己太累了。
呃啊！
人的力量
风无处不在。无论是在大海上航行、山谷中穿行，还是登上山顶，风始终是你的陪伴者。它穿过森林，欢快的抚过平原。它不断地移动，无所顾忌地吹过经过的一切。只需一点巧思，就可以制造出能捕捉风的&b叶片&r，它会随着风的永恒吹拂而转动。
&6将任意类型的羊毛连接到风车轴承即可捕捉风力！不过，面积必须足够大才能真正发挥作用。
呜呼！
风的力量
鼓风机根据其前方的方块不同，会产生多种用途。它可以用于熔炼（熔岩）、烟熏（火焰）、洗涤（水）或缠魂（灵魂火）气流中的物品。不同物品需要不同的处理方法。请查看JEI以获取配方详情。鼓风机还可以用来推动或拉动物品，这在与溜槽结合使用时尤其实用。
分散网被放置在鼓风机正前方时，会将鼓风机的效果扩散到所有方向。
厌倦了手动挖掘方块？试试用一个钻头（或者二十个！）来提高你的挖矿效率。只需将钻头对准你想要破坏的方块，并为装置提供应力即可。这种方法非常适合隧道挖矿或挖掘直到基岩的深坑。
自动镐
安山时代
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest1.descr: &b赫菲斯托斯锻炉&r是一台拥有不可思议力量的机械结构。将鼠标指针移到赫菲斯托斯锻炉物品上并按下W键来查询如何搭建它。
为了驾驭这股伟力，你需要向其献上&6灵魂&r，&6血液&r，&6经验&r以及&6耀金&r精华。可用物品列表在本章任务的最后几页上。
你可以使用它来锻造&d符文武器&r，&d修饰物&r，甚至是一些&d秘密武器&r。
-神秘水晶方尖碑（按住W以思索）
虽然它一开始只有&dTier 1&r，但是你可以升级它，以解锁更多配方和格子，每次升级还会额外解锁一个&6强化&r槽位。这有助于降低耀金消耗并解锁新的合成配方。
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest1.title: 赫菲斯托斯锻炉
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest10.desc: &d诱惑&r仪式是一种基础仪式，它将&d引诱以&b火盆&r为中心，极大范围内的&e友善生物&r靠近仪式。点击&dEMI&r 以查看更多。
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest11.desc: &d驱赶&r仪式是另一种基础仪式，它将&d驱散以&b火盆&r为中心，极大范围内的&e敌对生物&r远离仪式。点击&dEMI&r 以查看更多。
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest12.desc: &d欺骗&r仪式是一种基础仪式，它将&n重置&r你在&b村民&r之间的邪名。在你游玩&4暗黑技艺&r章节的旅途中- 一些人可能会被迫做一些有辱名声的事情，但只需要用这个小技巧就可以赢取村民们的谅解。
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest13.desc: &d日光仪式&r和&d月光仪式&r这两种仪式可以用来修改一天内的时间-分别对应&e白昼&r和&1夜晚&r。
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest14.desc: &d净化仪式&r是一种基础仪式，用于极大批量的&a治愈村民&r，它将净化&b火盆&r周围全部的&6僵尸村民&r，也会净化&6僵尸猪灵和僵尸疣猪兽&r。
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest15.desc: &d鲜血仪式&r是一系列&d仪式&r，可以给予施法者两件实用工具； &c鲜血护符&r和&c侵蚀之剑&r。这两种仪式都需要在&b火盆&r周围献祭活物- 在仪式过程中，&4被消耗&r。
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest16.desc: &d充能仪式&r用于为&6魂火魔杖和刺骨魔杖&r充能，分别消耗&6烈焰粉和雪球&r。 要开始充能，只需要举行对应的仪式并将你的&6魔杖&r放置于&b暗蚀焦点&r上。
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest17.desc: &d捕获仪式&r是一种独特的仪式，用于捕捉&b火盆&r附近的&6亡灵生物&r进入放置在&b暗蚀焦点&r上的&6召唤魔杖&r 里。&e（必须让它们的生命值至少降低到三分之一以下）&r。
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest18.desc: 你可以像建造雪傀儡一样组装自己的&d南瓜灵魂&r。先放置 2 个&6深色橡木原木&r，然后在上面放一个&6干草捆&r，最后在干草块上放一个&6雕刻南瓜&r。用 &6缥缈灵魂！&r右键点击南瓜，就能赋予它生命。
谁知道对这个灵魂使用转化试剂会催生什么东西……
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest18.subt: 打造属于你自己的南瓜灵魂！
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest2.descr: &b赫菲斯托斯锻台&r最多有4个用于放置&6增强遗物&r的插槽。这些强化物可以在世界各地的建筑中找到。集齐所有增强遗物，就能解锁熔炉的全部潜力。
-&b鲜血符印&r：大幅减少&6鲜血&r消耗。
下一页有每种&6增强遗物&r的作用。
-&b亵渎象征符&r：可用于制作&d诅咒&r物品。
-&b圣洁象征符&r：可用于制作&d天界&r物品。
-&b符文石板&r：可用于制作&d符文&r物品。
-&b基本元素&r：可用于制作&d基本元素&r物品。
-&b绯红之石&r：大幅减少&6灵魂&r消耗
-&b待盈新月&r：根据一天中的不同时间，大幅减少&6辉光&r的消耗。
-&b工匠遗物&r：大幅减少&6经验&r消耗。
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest2.title: 锻炉的增强遗物
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest23.desc: Many years ago, &ethere were nine Schools of Magic&r, not eight.

The &k&3Eldritch&r&3 School&r is not like the others. It is an ancient and powerful way of magic, one that has all but been forgotten; &eyou will be unable to immediately craft or cast &3&kEldritch&r Spells. However, shreds of &3ancient &kEldritch&r&3 manuscripts&r can still be found scattered throughout the world, and may even be pieced back together with the help of an echo shard to craft a complete &k&3Eldritch &r&3manuscript&r.
Once a manuscript has been restored, it can be consumed to learn a single &k&3Eldritch&r spell, enabling the crafting and casting of it.
Since the &k&3Eldritch &r&3School&r is so old, perhaps an &6Ancient City&r hold the key to rediscovery...
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest3.descr: 你可以用&b赫菲斯托斯锻炉&r打造强大的&d修饰物&r。
这些修饰物可以在锻造台上用&b修饰物升级模板&r来升级。
下一页列出了每种&d修饰物&r的作用。
-&b炉火棱镜&r：用于镐子。使其可以&d自动熔炼&r挖掘的方块。
-&b海洋棱镜&r：用于头盔。佩戴时，在水下可提供&d生命恢复&r和&d挖掘速度&r。
-&b撼地棱镜&r：用于破坏方块的工具。使工具拥有&d矿脉挖掘&r的能力，可以挖掘&d3×3&r的范围。
-&b旋风棱镜&r：当前未实装。你可以放置它，会给你施加&d缓降&r效果并将你向上推动。
-&b永恒之石&r：使一件工具或防具变为&d无法破坏的&r。它不再有耐久条。
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest3.title: 修饰物
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest4.descr: &b神秘匕首&r能让你通过击杀怪物，为一个&b试管&r填充&4鲜血&r。
它可以为&6赫菲斯托斯锻炉&r提供燃料。
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest5.descr: &e&o所以呢？你觉得自己有成为女巫的本事吗？走着瞧吧。&r&r
要开启你的巫术之旅，你必须获得&b暗影之书&r。它是可靠的&5黑暗魔法&r宝典，将指引你完成旅程。将它放置在&b书坛&r上，来解锁其中的力量。
此外，每个优秀的女巫都有属于自己的&b混合埚&r。
&o&5当你拥有了这些工具，真正的考验才刚刚开始。&r&r
注意：本整合包中暗影之书的配方已更新，可放心使用！
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest5.title: 女巫之事
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest6.descr: 如果你戴上&b女巫帽&r，就可以与女巫&6讨价还价&r。你可以给她们带来她们需要的物品来换取回报。
&o&5如果你足够幸运的话，你甚至可能会获得女巫之眼。&r&r
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest6.title: 和女巫们交易
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest7.descr: 黑暗仪式是一种仪式的强大替代方式，主要使用被&b石之手&r环绕的&b火盆&r以及&b暗蚀焦点&r来进行。
&e物品可放置在每一个容器中里，以实现许多独特的功能。&r
你可以在&6EMI&r中查看&b火盆&r的用途，以及一系列可执行的仪式。
中心的物品需要放置在&b火盆&r中，环绕周围的物品需要放置在&b石之手&r中，而带有独特边框的环绕物品则需要放在&b暗蚀焦点&r中。
当所有物品放置好后，用&6打火石&r点燃&b火盆&r，来启动仪式 。
&e放在周围的容器以及其中的物品，摆放的位置没有特定要求。&r
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest7.subti: 理解黑暗仪式的基础内容
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest7.title: 黑暗仪式
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest8.descr: 为了举行结晶仪式，需要在&b火盆&r上放置&6神秘骨粉&r并在周围的两个&b石之手&r放上&6红石&r。

ftbquests.chapter.elemental_magic.quest1: The Void school is themed around all things arcane and mystical, with spells that range from damage to utility to mobility.

There are &b8 Schools of Magic&r within &5Integrated Minecraft&r. Each class has a similar path of progression. First, the &eessence/focus&r of each school is needed. These can be used to make &erunes&r, which can in turn make &eupgrade orbs&r. There are also &espellbooks&r for some schools that are obtained in various ways. Check JEI/EMI for more information on the spellbooks.
&eUpgrade orbs &radd school/class bonuses to any weapons, armor, and curios.

In addition to the progression path of each school, there are additional progressions for &bIce, &cFire, &rand &dLightning&r thanks to &6Ice and Fire: Spellbooks&r. These classes use the power of dragons for an extra set of armor and an extra staff. There is also the &eDragonmancer's Oathbook, a powerful spellbook made with dragonsteel and scales.
ftbquests.chapter.elemental_magic.quest2: The Evocation school is themed around magical trickery and conjuration, covering the broadest range of offensive, defensive, and utility spells.
ftbquests.chapter.elemental_magic.quest3: The Lightning school is centered around concentrated damage.
ftbquests.chapter.elemental_magic.quest4: The Nature school is focused on applying debuffs to enemies, with elements of damage to finish them off.

The &5Dragonmancer's Oathbook&r is not specific to any school, but it pairs nicely with the &bIce Dragon Priest&r gear. I (Cap) have added it here because it balances out the &6Blaze Instruction Manual&r on the Fire School line.
ftbquests.chapter.elemental_magic.quest5: The Fire school is centered around damage and damage over time.
ftbquests.chapter.elemental_magic.quest6: The Holy school is centered around support, healing, and buffing allies.
ftbquests.chapter.elemental_magic.quest7: The Ice school is centered around damage and crowd control.
ftbquests.chapter.elemental_magic.quest8: The Lifeforce school is themed around evil; you will find elements of necromancy, wither, and blood magic here, with spells focusing on damage that buffs the caster.
ftbquests.chapter.elemental_magic.title: Elemental Magic

&b探索家地图&r是&5Integrated Minecraft&r整合包游戏核心部分，它扩充了原版游戏所提供的地图功能。地图可以带你去往特定的生物群系或结构。
Look in the &eShopping&r tab on the left menu to see the &bExplorer Maps&r available for you to buy. Some maps cannot be bought and must be obtained through quests.
Many of you already know how to use a Map, but here's a quick reference for anyone who's forgotten.

- The top of the map is &6North&r, and travelling in the &6negative Z direction&r takes you North. The red pole of the &bMagnetic Compass&r also points North, so if it is pointing upwards, you are travelling North.
- Left of the map is &6West&r, and travelling in the &6negative X direction&r takes you West. The &bMagentic compass&r will be pointing right.
- Right of the map is &6East&r, and travelling in the &6positive X direction&r takes you East. The &bMagentic compass&r will be pointing left.
- The bottom of the map is &6South&r, and travelling in the &6positive Z direction&r takes you South. The &bMagentic compass&r will be pointing down.
F3 will show the direction you are headed if you ever get confused.

ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest10.descrip: 当你接近红角公会时，你会听到武器和盔甲叮当作响，因为塔中的居民在塔中注视着你。不过，一旦你拿出&5便条&r，每个人都会消停下来，你也会被挥手送进去。
在那里，你会遇到一个深色头发，一只眼睛上戴着眼罩的老人。他脖子上挂着一条项链，上面是一只慢慢闪烁的红&5眼&r。
&b“感谢你的远道而来。我叫&5克雷辛&r&b，是现任公会会长。我经常给那些&6值得信赖&r&b的人发出便条，他们代表&5公会&r&b完成了许多大事。”
&b“现在我亲自见过你了，我们可以正式让你注册进入&5公会&r&b了。在&5合同&r&b上签字就行了。”
你在&5合同&r上签了字之后，它被闪闪发光的蓝色和紫色火焰点燃。
&b“很好！由于我们的一些&6任务&r&b要求&5公会会员&r&b在洞穴深处消灭一些怪物，&5合同&r&b作为验证这些&6任务&r&b完成的手段，就不用&5公会会员&r&b上交一些战利品了。”
&b“现在您已经注册了，您也可以在那边的柜台上上交这个&5便条&r&b来获得奖励。我经常向完成率较高的&6赏金板&r&b发送&5奖励便条&r&b，所以如果你得到更多便条，我非常欢迎你回来用它们换取更多商品。”

ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest19.descrip: 你看到海浪中有一个漂流瓶，里面装着一封信。出于好奇，你把它捞了起来并抽出了里面的信。上面写着：
&b「诚召所有的钓鱼爱好者们。到渔民中心（Fisherman's Lodge）来会见其他的渔夫们，来一起讨论钓鱼方法和寻找志同道合的人。希望这封信已经足以钓起你的兴趣，足以把你给钓到我们这来！」&r

你可能会碰巧遇见去哪里找到这些地方的传闻。如果是这样的话，我会在这一章节为你记下它们的。
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest2.title: 探索这片土地
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest20.descrip: 随着你逐渐接近海面上的小屋，一个拿着钓鱼竿的、胡子拉碴的人兴奋地向你打起了招呼！
&b"你好，你好，爱钓鱼的好伙计。真高兴你收到了我的信息！从我最开始散布那些漂流瓶到现在已经过了好几年了，我都开始失去希望了。"
&b"那么就请进吧。上这来，来点&6鱼肉炖&r。&b不用客气，需要什么拿什么。这些都是钓鱼相关的东西，但我就喜欢给爱钓鱼的伙计帮帮忙"&r
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest20.subtitl: 一座摇摇欲坠的小屋正位于水面上
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest20.title: 渔夫小屋
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest21.descrip: 在你和这位渔夫交谈时，他提到：
说实话，虽然我钓鱼是为了维持生计，但我喜欢看珍稀而独特的鱼。我写了一本日记，里面记载着我遇到过的所有鱼类。
&b"我爸教会了我钓鱼，他曾经提到过一种非常罕见的鱼，只有在&6这世界上的很小一部分地区&r才能找到。&b听起来好像只是个传说，但要是真的可不就太酷了嘛？我希望有朝一日可以亲眼见一次。"
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest21.title: 罕见鱼类？
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest22.subtitl: 所以……你发现了迷宫。你敢挑战迷宫里的东西吗？
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest23.subtitl: 你在陵寝迷宫（Labyrinth）的最深处找到了一把神秘的钥匙。旁边还附上了一份地图…
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest24.descrip: 你把&5便条&r递给招待员的时候，她灿烂地笑着问到，
&b或者也可能是更多的&5奖励和冒险？&r&b”
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest24.subtitl: 用公会长的便条兑换奖励！
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest24.title: 交易：用公会长的便条换取奖励
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest25.descrip: 当你靠近&b至高树&r时，树叶发出细微的沙沙声，似乎在传递信息。
随着声音渐渐消逝，你眼前浮现出&5一颗远古树&r的景象。景象消逝之际，四种如至高木般不同种类的远古树在你眼前一闪而过。该怎么做你懂的。
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest25.subtitl: 你听到了树叶间那微小的声音……
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest25.title: 风中低语 I
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest26.title: 购买：荒野恶兽的巢穴地图
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest27.descrip: 在你收集最后一颗树苗时，周围的世界变得鸦雀无声。然后，仿佛是如安排好的一般，话语从四面八方传来。有些是树叶的沙沙声，另外一些则是附近动物叽叽喳喳的声音。
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest27.title: 风中低语 II
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest28.descrip: 当你肃清最后的&d荒野族裔聚集地&r时，一道声音响起。
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest28.title: 风中低语 III
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest29.descrip: 当你到达&5树&r的位置时，一道令人既惊讶又愉悦的声音响起。
&b“英雄！谢谢你的帮助。我是&5灵慧树&r&b，正是我让&2万物之声&r&b来和你对话的。你帮了我们很大的忙。&6来我的山谷，汝将获得智慧的赐予。”&r
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest29.title: 风中低语 IV
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest3.descript: 当你将最后的材料交给女巫时，她们显得有些震惊。
&b“干的漂亮！说实话，你做的比我们想象的要快得多。”
&b“我本来想说，&d「别忘了你的行为代表着我，你的推荐人 」&r&b，但你已经足够棒了。去吧，代表我。”&r
&b“我不太在乎他们，所以你代替我再合适不过了。”&r
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest3.subtitle: 收集所需的材料以获得去往药剂师们住所的地图
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest3.title: 女巫的委托
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest30.descrip: 在这些&2荒野恶兽&r的老巢里，你发现了一些笔记。似乎有什么人一直在调查它们。
拼凑到一起后，笔记上写的是：
&b"把&6荒野召唤之板&r&b放到&6仪式火盆&r&b之上"
&b"给予它三种荒野生物的碎片各一个"&r
&b"此等至高荣耀归于&7召唤之人&r&b"。&r
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest30.title: 凶兽奇美拉 第一章
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest31.descrip: 你集齐了仪式所需的所有材料，正准备开始祭祀时，一个声音开始阻拦你。
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest31.title: 凶兽奇美拉 第二章
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest32.descrip: 你逐渐接近了那顶帐篷，这时一位满身尘土的女人挥手向你打招呼。
&b"你好！很高兴能在这看到其他没有恶意的人。"
&b"工作原因，我不大跟别人交谈。我叫&5Nico&r&b。我是个&7考古学家&r&b，一位真相的发掘者、遗迹的探险家，以及…一个全身沾满了淤泥和脏污的女人，大概吧。总之很高兴见到你。"&r
&b"&6如果你也和我一样是个考古迷，我可以给你张地图，上面是去我们目前的发掘场地的路线。&r&b. 遗憾的是我们干这行赚不到什么钱，所以&6来一点绿宝石&r&b我就把地图给你，那样我自己也能多买些吃的！"
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest32.subtitl: 一顶饱经风霜的帐篷映入你的眼帘…
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest32.title: 考古营地
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest33.descrip: &b"&6如果你也和我一样是个考古迷，我可以给你张地图，上面是去我们目前的发掘场地的路线&r&b。遗憾的是我们干这行赚不到什么钱，所以&6来一点绿宝石&r&b我就把地图给你，那样我自己也能多买些吃的！"
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest33.title: 购买：考古场地地图
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest34.title: 古老秘宝 I
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest35.descrip: 你发现了一本旅记，开始阅读里面的内容，这时一位旅行者拍了拍你的肩膀。
她清了清嗓子，不失紧张地说：“嘿朋友，我看到你在翻我的旅记。”你想因为偷看的事向她道歉，但她直接打断了你。
&b"哦不用担心，反正我现在也需要帮忙。我最近一直想用蜂蜜诱捕一头熊， 但那畜生口味刁得很，糖类显然没法让它松懈。你有什么主意没？"&r
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest35.subtitl: 你跌跌撞撞地走进了熊掌旅馆（Bearclaw Inn）
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest35.title: 熊掌旅馆（The Bearclaw Inn）
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest36.descrip: 你看到她正在森林边缘来回踱步，那本旅记正夹在她胳臂底下。随着希望的一瞥，她扬起一只手向你打起了招呼。
&b"你回来了，是吧？"&r她用柔和得多的声音说到。&b"那熊还在外边，躲在暗处嘶吼着呢。蜂蜜骗不到它，一点儿骗不到，我把我的蜂蜜棒全用完了，啥也没赚到。"&r她朝你的背包点了点头，&b"你看起来像是那种对陷阱略知一二的人。帮我带个好用的捕熊陷阱来——要带刺的那种，你懂的？带一个过来，我不会亏待你的：32个&6蜜渍苹果&r&b，全部归你。"&r
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest36.subtitl: 用一个捕熊陷阱做笔生意
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest36.title: 难题出现！
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest4.descript: 当你将最后的材料交给女巫时，她示意你靠近。
&b"听好了。你帮我收集到了这些东西，干得非常不错。我知道一个组织，组里的成员会帮助像我们这样的人。我赶时间，所以如果你能向我证明你确实才华横溢，足以成为他们小组当中的一员，那我就把地址给你。"&r
&b"总而言之，和你共事非常开心。很期待你接下来的努力成果。"&r
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest4.subtitle: 要是我们能获得她们的信任就好了……
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest4.title: 获取关于幻象药剂师的信息
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest5.descript: 当打败站在你面前的女巫时，你注意到一张纸条从她的口袋里掉了出来。
上面写着 &b“回到&5幻象药剂师之处&r。&b我们的研究已让我们更加接近永生的秘密。帮助我们研究，我们会给你回报的。荣耀归于宣判者。”&r
如果你能&e说话，或者能与女巫&6讨价还价&e&r，也许你就能找到&5幻象药剂师&r。&e不过，首先你得获取她们的信任。&r
如果你有一顶&6巫师帽&r的话，她们应该会更愿意接纳你……
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest5.subtitle: 你找到了一份信件，上面是写给一位炼金术士的内容…
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest5.title: 流言：召集所有药剂师
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest6.descript: 解救出&6村民们&r后，你偶然踩到了一封文件，里面包含了&5唤魔者们下达的命令&r。显然他们还会继续作恶，除非我们把他们连根拔起。
然而，残存的&6灾厄村民们&r迅速四散奔逃，如果不立刻展开追踪，你很可能会跟丢他们。
可是另一方面，尽管被解救的&6村民们&r应该不会离自己的村庄太远，但他们仍然没有足够的武装物品，无法在回家的路上抵御危险。你可以护送他们回家…&6但你自己则会失去找到&5灾厄村民大本营（Illagers fort）&6的机会。&r
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest6.subtitle: 你冲进了掠夺者的营地（Camp of Pillagers），开始解救被关起来的村民…
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest6.title: 掠夺者的营地（The Pillager Camp）
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest7.descript: 在完成了&b悬赏板&r中的许多&b悬赏令&r之后，你发现了一本&5笔记&r，里面提到了那个赫赫有名的&5红角公会&r的所在地。找到它，并注册成为&5公会&r的一员，你的辛劳就能换来更多报酬。
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest7.subtitle: 你在堆积如山的悬赏令中找到了一本笔记…
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest7.title: 来自公会会长的邀请
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest8.descript: 为了让&6村民们&r安全返乡，你亲自担起了护卫的责任，保障了他们的安全。接下来便是漫长而艰苦的追击行动，你开始追踪残存的&6灾厄村民&r，试图找到他们的老巢。
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest8.subtitle: 若选择了“带领村民抵达安全区”的任务，则此任务失效
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest9.descript: 你朝&6四散奔逃的灾厄村民们&r放心不下地望了一眼，最终还是转过身来，决定先不追踪他们。
这应该是最好的选择了。你大概率无法单枪匹马地拿下&5灾厄村民大本营（Illagers fort）&r，而送&6村民们&r回到安全地带却&e有可能让你获得丰厚的报酬&r。
&6村民们&r指出了家的方向，你开始护送他们。
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest9.subtitle: 若选择了“向灾厄村民复仇”的任务，则此任务失效
ftbquests.chapter.rumors.title: 传闻
你在&5陵寝迷宫（Labyrinth）最深处的墓穴&r发现了一本笔记，上面记载着不死法老的武器资料。
-看样子法老王的锻材是从&b猪灵&r那里拿到的。
将一把&d辛辛那长矛&r放进&6二级&r赫菲斯托斯锻炉
虽然一些细节尚不清楚，但笔记提到，锻造过程包括：
-将一把&d锻材与金锭相似的长矛&r放入神之锻炉。
-在锻炉四周放置8个暗黑石基座
-&d2x与这把长矛的锻材相同的材料&r
不死法老的佩剑与长矛
ftbquests.chapter.secret_recipes.quest10: 你在&5末地要塞的秘密实验室里（secret lab within the Stronghold）&r发现了一本笔记，里面是制造末地传送门的方法。
某人曾在这里开展了一些实验，试图将天空中流星的能量与维度的能量混合…看来，实验成功了
末地传送门框架制作工艺

将一把&d太古合金双头剑&r放进&6五级&r赫菲斯托斯锻炉

ftbquests.chapter.secret_recipes.subtitl: Find Tattered Books to Unlock New Recipes!
ftbquests.chapter.secret_recipes.title: &6Secret Recipes&r
ftbquests.chapter.spells_and_rituals.que: The &bRitual Brazier&r is a powerful device used for performing rituals. &dRituals&r are more powerful versions of spells, and come in semi-permanent or single-use forms. You will need a &britual tablet&r of some sort to get started with your first ritual. &eA few of the more commonly used &drituals&e are linked to this quest.&r

Once you have obtained a &btablet&r of your choice, place the &bbrazier&r on the ground and use the tablet on it. The &dritual&r is now awaiting activation. At this time, you can &eadd augmentations to your ritual&r. Simply throw whichever augments you would like onto the &bbrazier&r. To start the &dritual,&r &einteract with the &bbrazier&e once more&r, making sure you have an empty hand. At this point, no further augments can be added. If &5source&r is needed for the &dritual&r, place &bsource jars&r within 5 blocks of the brazier.
Conduct Rituals!
Rituals

&6Spell Scrolls&r are for &cBattle Magic&r &7(Iron's Spells and Spellbooks)&r! They are mostly focused on combat, both offense and defense. Each scroll contains a spell. These spells can be added to &cbattle magic spellbooks&r. They can also be upgraded to become more powerful.

&6Glyphs&r are for &dUtility Magic&r &7(Ars Nouveau)&r! They are used for a variety of activities and mostly help with quality of life. Glyphs cannot do much on their own, but when combined in a &dutility magic spellbook&r, they can create amzing combinations of magic.
Spell Scroll
Spells Scrolls and Glyphs
The base for crafting all other upgrade orbs
The &bArcane Anvil&r is a late-game device used for making your spells and gear even more powerful.

&dSpells&r can be upgrades by placing the &bspell scroll&r into the anvil along with the next required tier of &bink&r. It could be the same current tier as the scroll or one higher. For example, a level one scroll might require common or uncommon ink. Each spell scroll's requirements are a bit different. &eCombining them in the anvil will raise the spell level by one.&r Continue doing this until it reaches &6Legendary&r rarity. The spell is now at its most powerful.
&bUpgrading Armor and Tools --->

&cArmors&r can gain magic power in the &bArcane Anvil&r. Put the item you wish to upgrade into the anvil along with an &dUpgrade Orb&r. The type of orb used indicates what power the item will gain. By default, up to three orbs can be used per item.

&cWeapons&r can be imbued with spells by combining the &bweapon&r of your choice and the &bspell scroll&r of your choice in the &bArcane Anvil&r. The level/rarity of the scroll matters, so be sure it is the one you want.
Upgrade Spells, Staffs, and Armor
Use in in Smithing Table to remove Imbuement or Upgrades
Used in an Arcane Anvil to increase spell slots in books
Used in an Arcane Anvil to increase spell slots in books
Used in an Arcane Anvil to increase spell slots in books
Schools of Magic Foci
Tiers of Ink

&bAugments&r can be found throughout the world. They also have upgrades accessible through crafting. Augments fit into a special &e"Augment Curio Slot"&r and give the player both advantages and disadvantages in relation to &cbattle magic&r.
Augments

The &bScroll Forge&r is used to craft scrolls by using ink, paper, and a focus. The ink determines the rarity (and therefore level), and the focus determines spell’s school. Look at the &e"Elemental Magic"&r quest chapter to see what the foci are.
Create Spells!

This table is much easier than the &bScribe's Table&r. The spells for it are already created. You can find these &eIron's Spells and Spellbooks&r scrolls throughout the world in various loot chests. In order to use a spell scroll more than once, this &bInscription Table&r is needed.

To use this table, place an &eIron's Spellbook&r into it. You can then add spell scrolls to the spellbook. Each book has a certain number of spellslots so the better the book, the more spells you can input. Pay attention to the rarity of the spell scrolls. &dHigher rarities make the spells more powerful.&r Therefore, you may want to use a Lvl 4 Shield instead of a Lvl 1 if you have both for example.
To create or upgrade spell scrolls, use the &bSpell Forge&r.
Iron's Spellbooks Spells
Use this table to craft and learn &dGlyphs&r! Glyphs can be used in &eArs Nouveau&r spellbooks to create different combinations and thus, different spells.

To craft a &dglyph&r, R-Click on the table with an &eArs Spellbook&r in your hand. You will see a GUI with every possible (aka not disabled) &dglyph&r. The vibrant ones are &dglyphs&r you already know. Click on a faded one and then hit "select" at the bottom right. You will exit the GUI and see the necessary ingredients for the &dglyph&r floating above the table. Gather the ingredients and throw them onto the table to create the &dglyph&r. R-Click the &dglyph&r to learn it.
Ars Nouveau Glyphs

This &dRitual&r lets you trap mobs inside a containment jar. You will need a &bcontainment jar&r within three blocks of the brazier. &5Source&r is required for capturing more than one mob. Make sure the mob is close the &bbrazier&r in order for it to be captured. With the help of &6Drygmies&r, you can automatically farm the drops of mobs within the jars.
&7Note: Some mobs, like dragons, have been blacklisted from the containment jar.
Step one to automating resource collection

This &dRitual&r lets you summon a random assortment of &6wilden&r. &dAugment&r the ritual with a &eWilden Spike&r, &eWilden Horn&r, and &eWilden Wing&r in order to summon the &cWilden Chimera&r. This beast is one of the toughest bosses in the game.
For those who like boss fights

This &dRitual&r lets you highlight a specific block for a few minutes. &dAugment&r the ritual with the block you would like to highlight and add a manipulation essence if you would like to increase the ritual's duration.
Diamond mining just got easier!

&6Drygmies&r can be summoned by &eusing a &bdrygmy charm&e on a block of mossy cobblestone.&r The mossy cobblestone will then be transformed into a&b Drygmy Henge&r. You can use more drygmy charms on the henge to summon more drygmies. Casting dispell or killing the drygmy will return the charm.

A &6Drygmy&r will passively collect items from entities in a 10 block radius of its henge. This means that infinite mob drops can be collected from singular mobs. &eDrygmies will collect the drops of mobs inside containment jars.&r The items will be deposited inside a chest next to the henge. &5Source&r is required for &6Drygmies&r to collect and deposit items, so add a &bsource jar&r next to the henge as well.
&7Example: A drygmy will collect mutton and wool from sheep in nearby containment jars.
Step two to automating resource collection
Drygmy
Trade &bGemstones&r for &bMaps&r to locate some structures!
&eNot all structures have maps that can be purchased.&r Complete quests in the exploration chapter to earn maps to structures that don't appear here.
You can also use &6Locator Eyes&r to find some dungeons instead of using maps. These are typically for bosses.
ftbquests.chapter.structure_maps.title: Structure Maps
ftbquests.chapter.suit_up.quest1.descrip: 每种&6龙钢&r盔甲可以升级成2种不同的盔甲。
&o&5这便是游戏中最强大的6套盔甲。&r&r
ftbquests.chapter.suit_up.quest10.title: 天龙神秘盔甲
ftbquests.chapter.suit_up.quest11.descri: &b钻石盔甲&r可以升级成3种不同的盔甲，每种各有其优劣。
ftbquests.chapter.suit_up.quest11.title: 钻石盔甲
ftbquests.chapter.suit_up.quest12.title: 下界合金盔甲
ftbquests.chapter.suit_up.quest13.title: 琥珀金盔甲
ftbquests.chapter.suit_up.quest14.title: 死灵合金盔甲
ftbquests.chapter.suit_up.quest2.title: 龙炎钢盔甲
ftbquests.chapter.suit_up.quest3.title: 龙霜钢盔甲
ftbquests.chapter.suit_up.quest4.title: 龙霆钢盔甲
ftbquests.chapter.suit_up.quest5.title: 暗金属盔甲
ftbquests.chapter.suit_up.quest6.title: 腾炎盔甲
ftbquests.chapter.suit_up.quest7.title: 恐怖盔甲
ftbquests.chapter.suit_up.quest8.title: 耀眼深海盔甲
ftbquests.chapter.suit_up.quest9.title: 咒魂盔甲
ftbquests.chapter.suit_up.title: 全副武装
ftbquests.chapter.the_basics_of_magic.qu: It's like a crafting table, but bigger and more magical!
The &bVitalic Sourcelink&r generates &dSource&r whenever animals are bred near it or mobs are killed near it.
Breed or Kill Mobs for Source!
The &bVolcanic Sourcelink&r burns nearby fuel items (whether they be on &bArcane Pedestals&r, &bArcane Platforms&r, or are &bdropped items&r) to generate &dSource&r.
Turns nearby &bStone&r into &bMagma Blocks&r and eventually into &bLava&r.
Convert Flamable Items into Source!
Absorbs &bPotions&r from nearby &bPotion Jars&r to generate &dSource&r.
Consumes Potions for Source!
&bSource Relays&r sends &dSource&r from &bJars&r to other &bJars/Relays&r.
The &bDominion Wand&r tells the &bJars/Relays&r where to send and receive &dSource&r. Use &eR-Click&r to set locations with the wand.
Transport your Source!
&bArgonomic Sourcelinks&r generate &dSource&r when nearby crops grow.
&bSource Jars&r must be within 5 blocks of the &bAgronomic Sourcelink&r.
Grow Crops for Source!

&bMycelial Sourcelinks&r generate &dSource&r when fueled with food on &bArcane Pedestals&r, &bArcane Platforms&r, or &bdropped nearby&r. Generates more &dSource&r if the food is a &dSource&r producing food.
Slowly converts the ground below it into &bMycelium&r and eventually causes &bMushrooms&r to grow.
Consumes Food for Source!
The &bImbuement Chamber&r absorbs passive &dSource&r from the environment to enhance the magical properties of various items.
Items augmenting (ie. placed on pedestals surrounding) the &bImbuement Chamber&r will NOT be consumed.
Create Source Gems!

An &bEnchanting Apparatus&r allows one to make all sorts of refined magical equipment. Simply put in the item you are modifying, surround the Apparatus with the appropriate items on the surrounding &bArcane Pedestals&r, and supply enough &dSource&r.
&bEnchanting Apparatus&r can also be used to create the specific &bEnchanted Books&r that you want. Just provide the right catalysts.
A New Way to Enchant!
Enchanting Apparatus

&bImbuement Chambers&r and &bEnchanting Apparatus&r can use nearby items to influence what they produce. &bArcane Pedestals&r act as a way to both display items and provide items to modify the properties of &dImbuing&r and &dEnchanting Rituals&r.
They need to be within 3 blocks of the &bImbuement Chamber&r or the &bEnchantment Apparatus&r to have effect.
Augment your Rituals!
&dMage Armor&r can be enhanced through &dMagical Threads&r. Each Armor has a level associated with it, and the strength of the applied &dThread's effect&r will be based on that level.
See the &eWorn Notebook - Magical Armor&r for more info.
Customize your Armor!
Some of the most common and useful ingredients
&bMagebloom Seeds&r, obtained through the &bEnchanting Apparatus&r, produce &bMagebloom Fiber&r which can be made into various &dMagical Armors&r.

Each &dArmor&r starts off at Tier 1. Upgrade to Tier 2 with two &bBlaze Rods&r in an &bEnchanting Apparatus&r, and Tier 3 with two &bEnder Pearls&r and one &bChorus Fruit&r in an &bEnchanting Apparatus&r. Each upgrade increases the amount of &dMana Regen&r and the number of &bAugmenting Threads&r an &dArmor&r can hold.
Create Magic Armor!
Provides the least armor but supports the strongest &dAugmentation Threads&r.
Sorcerer's Robes

Provides more armor than the &dSorcerer's set&r and supports stronger &dAugmentation Threads&r than the &dBattlemage's set&r, but weaker threads than the &dSorcerer's&r and less armor than the &dBattlemage's&r.
Arcanist's Robes
Provides the most Armor but supports the least powerful &dAugmentation Threads&r.
Battlemage's Robes
Used in mid-tiered magic recipes
Magical Ores and Ingots
&dSource Gems&r can be made by putting any of the following items inside the &bImbuement Chamber&r:
- Lapis
- Amethyst Shard
- Spinel
- Arcane Crystal
- Sapphire
The basic ingredient for many magic recipes
Can be imbued into source gems
Netherite Battlemage's Armor
Pewter, created by mixing lead and silver in a heated basin, is needed to craft the magic workbench. Check out "The Brass Age" to learn about heated mixing.
Used for several Hepheastus Forge recipes
Used in more complex and difficult magic recipes
Can be imbued into source gems. Also used in several magic recipes
Common ingredient in magic recipes. Can be consumed to gain experience

To cast spells of your own, you need to use &5Mana&r. You start out with a small amount of &5mana&r, but certain armor, robes, and jewelry can increase it. &5Mana&r will passively regenerate, but there are potions to speed up recovery. Again, armor and trinkets can help increase &5mana&r regeneration time.

&bArs Nouveau&r and &bIron's Spells and Spellsbooks&r have been integrated to share the same mana system. Since &ethe amounts of mana were disproportionate&r when simply sharing the same mana system, &emana values have also been adjusted&r.
Internal Fuel for Magic
Mana

&5Source&r is what powers magic not directly cast by the player. This includes things such as spell turrets, enchanting apparatuses, and imbuement chambers. &5Source&r can be collecting in a variety of ways using &bSourcelinks&r. It can be stored using &bSource Jars&r and transferred using &bSource Relays&r.
External Fuel for Magic
Source
&dSource&r is required to fuel many arcane machines. However, before you learn how to gather it, you need to create a place to store it.
Stores up to &d10,000 Source&r.
Store Source!
Storing Source
ftbquests.chapter.the_brass_age.quest1.d: More complex &eCreate&r components are crafted with precision machines. These machines are made by deploying a cogwheel, large cogwheel, and iron ingot (in that order) 5 times. Because these are so difficult to make, however, there is a chance that it will not succeed and you will instead get another item.
ftbquests.chapter.the_brass_age.quest2.d: These wheels can only be crafted by a mechanical crafter due to their enormous size. When two crushing wheels are placed next to each other and rotate in opposite directions, they become an important part of automation. Crushing wheels will refine items thrown in at the top into their more basic components. Sometimes you can even get a bit more material out of the refined items. Chutes placed above and below the crushing wheels allow for items to automatically be input and output.
ftbquests.chapter.the_brass_age.quest3.d:
有时候，只有普通的工作台是不够的。你需要更大，更机械化的东西！动力合成器可以彼此相邻放置，这样以此来实现比 3x3 更大的合成。只要所有的动力合成器相连，那么就只需要一个旋转力来连接。它们也可以被添加到农场中，以便自动制作产品。
完美的刷铁机输出铁块，而不是铁锭和铁粒。

The crafting process starts when every crafter has an item or when the crafter recieves a redstone input. Make sure that the arrows on the crafters are pointed ini a way that brings the slotted items together in the desired way. An exit point for the crafted item is also needed.

&8&oThe Mechanical Villager&r &8&oIndustries is not liable in any way, shape, or form for any misuse, malpractice, workplace injuries, or random speaking of french that may arise from using this product. Use at your own risk!
ftbquests.chapter.the_brass_age.quest4.d: The first step to the brass age is creating brass. Makes sense, right? In order to make brass, you'll need to heat a basin using a blaze burner. Take your empty blaze burner into the nether and r-click a blaze with it. The blaze will now stay in the blaze burner indefinitely. Don't forget to feed it!
ftbquests.chapter.the_brass_age.quest5.d: In a heated basin, mix together copper and zinc. Place the basin on top of a blaze burner. R-click the blaze burner with fuel (coal, wood, blaze rod, etc.) to heat.
ftbquests.chapter.the_brass_age.quest6.d: These components act very similar to their vanilla/andesite counterparts, but with more options. Brass components allow for filtering by item type, size, etc. For more information on specific components, ponder the item.
ftbquests.chapter.the_brass_age.quest7.d: Deployers can act as a player when it comes the world interactions. They can use weapons like swords, and tools like shears. R-click with a wrench to toggle between acting as a l-click (attack/destroy) and r-click (place). R-click with the weapon/tool/item on the brass hand's hitbox to give it to the depoyer.

Deployers are also a very important tool for recipe sequences. Many recipe  sequences require items to be deployed on whatever is processing. This works for items on belts and depots. Chutes placed above deployers can provide them with more items if needed.
ftbquests.chapter.the_brass_age.quest8.d: Mechanical arms can move items between inventories as long as the inventory is "open" (belt, depot, funnel) and not "closed" (vault, chest, barrel). Input and output locations must be set before placing down the mechanicall arm. To do this, r-click once on the desired output inventory and r-click twice on the desired input inventory. There can be multiple input and output locations as long as they are within reach of the arm.
These arms cannot filter items themselves, but will follow the filters of brass funnels listed as input locations. This works especially well when paired with a mechanical crafter.
ftbquests.chapter.the_brass_age.quest9.d: Place the mechanical crafters in a grid like so:

Input the crafting materials according to the EMI recipe. Be sure that the mechanical crafters are aligned so that the items will move correctly and have a point of exit. Use your new Extendo Grip in your offhand to have extra reach whenever you may need it. This might come in handy for mining, fighting, building, and more!
ftbquests.chapter.the_brass_age.title: The Brass Age
&ePipe:&r Pipes are the most basic component when it comes to transporting fluids. They carry fluid to and from other copper components.

&eMechanical Pump:&r To move fluids, rotational power must be provided to a mechanical pump. The direction of the pump controls the fluid, not the direction of the rotational power. You can r-click with a wrench on the pump to change the direction of the flow.

&ePortable Fluid Interface:&r These act as pipes for tanks that are part of moving contraptions. One interface goes on the contraption and the other is stationary with a one or two block gap in between. They will pause the contraption and allow for fluids to travel through as needed. THis can be stopped with a redstone signal.
ftbquests.chapter.the_copper_age.quest10: Steam engines are an excellent source of power generation. They can be placed off of a fluid tank, and when r-clicked with a shaft, transform into a kinetic output.

In order to operate, there needs to be a minimum of four fluid tanks, heat provided below the tanks, and sufficient enough water. The more water, heat, and tank size, the higher the kinetic output will be. Blaze burners provide an exceptional source of heat.
Note: More than one steam engine can be placed on a tank, but adds to the water, heat, and size minimum requirements.
ftbquests.chapter.the_copper_age.quest11: In addition to water, lava, etc., experience can now be transported through pipes!
ftbquests.chapter.the_copper_age.quest12: The disenchanter works just like an item drain, but for experience only. It will remove enchantments off of items, transforming those enchantments into liquid experience. If a player is standing on top of the disenchanter, their levels will also be removed and turned into liquid experience.
ftbquests.chapter.the_copper_age.quest14: This guide can be configured with r-click and given to a blaze burner with sneak r-click to turn it into a blaze enchanter. Based on the configured enchantment, the blaze enchanter will add enchantments to items it processes. These items must be able to accept the enchantments, so there is no adding Feather Falling to a sword or Impaling to a helmet. Books do not work with blaze enchanters, a printer is needed for that.
ftbquests.chapter.the_copper_age.quest15: Experience is required to make copies of enchanted books. Hyper experience can make the enchanting one level higher than its max. Example: Fortune III becomes Fortune IV. Hyper experience is required if the enchantment being copied already exceeds the vanilla max.
ftbquests.chapter.the_copper_age.quest16: Ink is required to make copies of written books.
ftbquests.chapter.the_copper_age.quest17: Place a disenchanter where you can step on it and connect it to a fluid tank. Make sure the fluid direction is going from the disenchanter to the tank. Next, have pipes coming up from the tank and out to a valve. The valve should be open on the side opposite the pipes from the tank. When you want to store experience, step on the disenchanter. When you want to take experience, step near the valve and turn the handle to open.
ftbquests.chapter.the_copper_age.quest18: Want to explore underwater, but can't hold your breath too long? Craft a set of copper diving gear to adventure to the depths of the ocean. Placing the backtank down and using rotational force to power it will fill it with air. You can then put it on in tandem with the helmet and have oxygen underwater. The diving boots will help you to run and jump across the ocean floor.
ftbquests.chapter.the_copper_age.quest19: This netherite set of diving gear works just like the copper one, but also helps in lava. Not only will you stay safe from burns, the helmet will help you see better under lava. You'll need a netherite chestplate and leggings to be fully fireproof.
&bCopper&r is not only useful for decoration, it can also be used to make methods of transporting fluids! When a &bbucket&r won't cut it, &bpipes&r can transport larger amounts of liquid. Water, lava, potions, and more, &bcopper&r is the way to go.
&6Create a Copper Casing by applying some Copper Ingots to a Stripped Log.&r
ftbquests.chapter.the_copper_age.quest20: &cCreate: Molten Metals&r adds the ability to heat up ores so much that they turn into liquids. &6Mix an ore in a heated basin to melt it.&r To turn molten metals back into ingots, use a spout to put the molten metal into a mold and cool it off with bulk washing. A ceramic mold has a chance to break and disappear, but a reular ingot mold will last forever.
Some recipe sequences may require molten metals. Treat it the same as you would any recipe sequence using lava or water. &6One ingot melts down into 144mB of liquid&r.
Is it just me or is it hot in here?
Item drains allow for items with fluid to be placed on top and drained. The item (such as a bucket or glass bottle) will remain on top of the drain, but the fluid can be transported through pipes now. A limited amount of fluid can be stored in the drain itself.
A hose pulley can add or remove fluids from large areas. Providing rotational force will lower the hose and reversing the rotation will raise the hose. The fluids will always drain top to botom and fill bottom to top. If the fluid source is large enough, its level will not be affected by the hose pulley. Pipes can be connected to the hose pulley opposite the side of the rotational force input.
Spouts can add liquid to items on depots or belts underneath. Spouts must be filled using pipes and cannot be accessed manually.
Sprinklers must be placed below a fluid pipe and will pour out whatever liquid is inside the pipes. This can be used to help water crops, deploy potions, or even make lava rain down.
Fluid tanks are a much more compact way of storing fluids. Much like item vaults, they cannot be accessed manually. Pipes can be placed on any side to add or drain fluis from the tank. Fluid tanks must have a square base (1x1, 2x2, or 3x3) but can extend vertically by quite a lot.
A fluid valve decides whether or not fluids are allowed to pass through the pipes. When turned one direction (using a valve handle, for example) they will stop fluid from passing through. Turning the other direction will once again allow fluid to pass. Valve handles can be dyed for aesthetic purposes.
ftbquests.chapter.the_copper_age.title: The Copper Age
ftbquests.chapter.the_idk_age.quest1.des: It's no small feat to make a sturdy sheet! First you will need to crush up some obsidian until it turns to dust. Take a lead ingot and spout some lava on it. Then deploy your newly crushed obsidian dust onto the lead ingot. Press it down firmly to lock everything in place.
ftbquests.chapter.the_idk_age.quest10.de: Sturdy sheets help craft a variety of late-game devices. Chunk loaders, storage solutions, and even locomotives!
ftbquests.chapter.the_idk_age.quest11.de: To fill a chunk loader, r-click a ghast with it in your hand. An andesite chunk loader will load a single chunk.
ftbquests.chapter.the_idk_age.quest12.de: When placed next to an inventory blcok (chest, vault, barrel) it connects any inventory blocks touching the first one into one large inventory network. In order to access your inventory network, you must have a storage terminal.
ftbquests.chapter.the_idk_age.quest14.de: Inventory cables are great for connecting your inventory network together across lots of empty space. There are different types of cables as well. Framed cables can be painted to fit in with surrounding blcoks.
ftbquests.chapter.the_idk_age.quest15.de: This is the final chapter for learning about automation! By now, you probably understand at least some of the fundamental concepts of &eCreate&r. To test your knowledge, your last challenge is to craft an advanced wireless terminal. It requires andesite, copper, brass, and sturdy sheets. No instructions this time, use what you've learned and the recipe tree in EMI to build this device. &2Good luck!&r
NOTE: You might want to add in a chunk loader near your inventory network so that you can actually access your storage from anywhere.
ftbquests.chapter.the_idk_age.quest16.de: Train schedules allow for other mobs to control trains. Schedules can be configured by r-clicking while holding it. Any mob in a seat placed next to train controls can become a conducter. To turn a mob into a conducter, give it a configured train schedule. Blaze burners may become conducters from anywhere on the train.
ftbquests.chapter.the_idk_age.quest17.de: Train signals help control the flow of traffic for trains not driven by a player. To use one, hold it and r-click a track. Then place it nearby. Train signals have arrows pointing in the direction that trains are allowed to go. A signal can go both ways if a second train signal is placed on the other side of the track. For more information on the different settings and configurations of trainn tracks, use the ponder ability.
ftbquests.chapter.the_idk_age.quest18.de: This handy device allows you to couple and decouple without having to disassemble trains. You can change the gap between the couplers by scrolling your mouse on the coupler with a wrench in hand. You can also toggle between modes: couple, decouple, or both.
ftbquests.chapter.the_idk_age.quest19.de: To fill a chunk loader, r-click a ghast with it in your hand. A brass chunk loader will load in a 1x1, 3x3, or 5x5 grid. This is configurable by r-clicking the chunk loader.
ftbquests.chapter.the_idk_age.quest20.de: Chunk loaders can be placed on stationary ground, moving contraptions, and trains. They require a lot of rotational force. There needs to be both enough power and enough speed to get the chunk loader working.
It is not recommended to place a chunk loader on a contraption that will continously load and unload chunks but it is possible. This is because of the lag that can generate.

Placing the chunk loader off of a train station makes it no longer need rotational force. Rather, it will load chunks when a train is stopped at the station AND un/loading goods. This is helpful for transporting items across long distances.

Using a chunk loader on a train is not recommended for just transporting items. Trains do not need chunks to be loaded in order to move them, so a chunk loader at a station will be more helpful in most situations. If the train is using rollers or ploughs or something, s chunk loader on the train itself may be helpful.
ftbquests.chapter.the_idk_age.quest3.des: Tired of having overflowing chests? Worry no more with the super advanced (but somehow still simple?) &6storage terminal&r! When placed on a network with an inventory connecter, you can store as much as you want within that inventory network. No need to worry about sorting either. This machine comes with a built in search tool.
&6This is a great device to access your vaults. Thousands of items within easy reach!&r
&bNOTE: Needs an inventory connecter to access multiple vaults at once.
ftbquests.chapter.the_idk_age.quest5.des: A wireless terminal allowd you to access your inventory as long as you are within 16 blocks of it. No longer will you have to bounce back between your enchanting setup, kitchen, and storage. Now you can access it at the push of a button!
ftbquests.chapter.the_idk_age.quest6.des: Place down some train tracks and r-click them while holding a train station. A long, flat stretch of track is best. Open the train station's menu and select "Create New Train." Place a train casing on any of the highlighted tracks to turn it into a bogey. From there, you can build off of the bogey and design your train. Make sure to use superglue to keep everything together. When you are done building, open the station's menu again and select "Assemble Train." NOTE: You must have at least on train control on board.
ftbquests.chapter.the_idk_age.quest7.des: &eCreate&r allows for some amazing mechanics using trains. Far more than I could fit in this quest. Make sure to ponder about trains and their components to learn about them in much more detail.
ftbquests.chapter.the_idk_age.quest9.des: Track switches allow for trains to switch which track the train will go on. To use one, hold it r-click a track that has multiple turn options. Then place the track switch down nearby. The switch can be toggled right by r-clicking and left by sneak r-clicking. Projectiles, redstone, and more can also toggle the switch.
ftbquests.chapter.the_idk_age.title: The Industrial Age
ftbquests.chapter.tools.quest1.descripti: 背包是携带更多物品的好办法。把它们背在背上，然后用&dB&r键打开它们。
They also have a ton of special &bUpgrades&r. Experiment with the ones you like best!
ftbquests.chapter.tools.quest1.subtitle: 扩大你的物品栏！
ftbquests.chapter.tools.quest10.descript: &a刀&r是全能的工具，可以作为武器，可以从地里收获稻草，也可以从动物身上获取额外的材料。当配合&a砧板&r使用的时候，你就可以充分地利用你的动植物资源！
ftbquests.chapter.tools.quest10.subtitle: 加工食物！
ftbquests.chapter.tools.quest11.descript: &b笼子&r能够捕捉足够小的动物。也许对你开农场有些帮助！
An &bAbacus&r can be used to count the number of blocks between the block you right clicked and the block you are looking at, up to 48 blocks.
ftbquests.chapter.tools.quest11.subtitle: 捕获生物！
ftbquests.chapter.tools.quest11.title: Building Tools
ftbquests.chapter.tools.quest12.descript: &b抹泥铲&r会随机放置您快捷栏中的方块。
&b算盘&r可以用来计算从你右键点击的方块，到你现在正在看的方块之间的距离，至多48块。
ftbquests.chapter.tools.quest13.descript: 这片土地上到处都是亟待被做成美食的美味食材。既然你可以用&b厨锅&r做更大更丰盛的菜，那就不要满足于无聊的烤马铃薯。然而，你需要以某种方式&a加热&r锅，还可能需要某种厨具来盛放你刚出锅的热气腾腾的菜。
ftbquests.chapter.tools.quest13.subtitle: Eat a food that grants Nourishing!
ftbquests.chapter.tools.quest13.title: Nourishing!
ftbquests.chapter.tools.quest14.descript: &b营养丰富的&r食物在效果持续期间，可以防止玩家因恢复生命值以外的原因而失去&b饥饿值&r和&b饱和度&r！
ftbquests.chapter.tools.quest14.subtitle: 食用一个提供舒适效果的食物。
ftbquests.chapter.tools.quest14.title: 温暖又舒适！
ftbquests.chapter.tools.quest15.descript: &bFeeding Troughs&r are storage blocks that animals will automatically eat from. &6With enough food, animals may breed on their own!&r
ftbquests.chapter.tools.quest15.subtitle: Automatically feed animals!
ftbquests.chapter.tools.quest16.descript: 在你品尝不同的食物时，你将会解锁额外的生命值！在尝试&6前50种不同的食物&r以获得第一颗生命值奖励之后，每25种不同的食物解锁一颗额外的生命值奖励。&e生活调味料：胡萝卜版&r的&b饮食清单&r会追踪你目前的进度。试着把整合包提供的食物都吃掉吧！
ftbquests.chapter.tools.quest16.subtitle: Gain more hearts by eating new foods!

- &d"Shift + Right Click"&r to retrieve an entire stack of items.

Complete the quests to earn rewards and to build up &5Reputation&r! As you become more &5Reputable&r, you may find that the Quests give better rewards or even new unique Rewards!

Additionally, you can scope further in or out with a mousewheel!

ftbquests.chapter.tools.quest9.descripti: &a刀&r是全能的工具，可以作为武器，可以从地里收获稻草，也可以从动物身上获取额外的材料。当配合&a砧板&r使用的时候，你就能充分地发挥你的动植物资源的作用！
- &dRight-click&r with an item in your hand to place it on the cutting board
- Equip your knife, &dright-click&r on the cutting board and see what happens!
- You can hold the item in your &doff hand&r and the knife in your &dmain hand&r to make this process much faster.
Knives aren't the only tool that can be used on the cutting board. Try looking up its uses (&dHover + Press U&r) to see what you can make.
